title: Micromax Canvas Spark to go on open Sale on Snapdeal today; priced at Rs 4,999
text:
Other Articles Rajesh Exports buys world's largest gold refining firm Valcambi for $400 mn in cash LIC elevates two more women to top brass Indian rupee declines 4 paise against US dollar in early trade Micromax has announced an open sale for the affordable 3G budget smartphone on July 27 and 28 exclusively on Snapdeal at Rs 4,999 only.
Micromax recently declared that it has already sold 5,00,000 units of Canvas Spark since its launch in April this year.
The Canvas Spark sports a 8MP rear camera, 2MP front camera and has 2000mAh bettery to keep it running. The Canvas Spark is a dual-SIM smartphone with support for 3G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and GPS.
We are humbled by the overwhelming response especially from young consumers. This success has also strengthened our partnership with Snapdeal, who shares our vision to deliver superb value to consumers. With the first ever open sale of Canvas Spark we hope that many more fans of this model will be able to buy this device,” Vineet Taneja, CEO, Micromax said.
The device has curved edges with the hardware keys placed on the right. It has 4.7 inch display with 960×540 pixel resolution with good viewing angles. It packs in a MediaTek 1.3Ghz quad-core processor and features 1GB of RAM and 8GB internal storage. It runs on Android Lollipop OS out of the box, a feature that is lacking in most of the low-priced smartphones.
Snapdeal tweeted on Micromax Canvas Spark sale. Below is the tweet:
Thank you for the amazing response, #MicromaxCanvasSpark is sold out! Stay tuned for the open sale on 27th July! pic.twitter.com/zqgHsnqouA
— Snapdeal.com (@snapdeal) July 22, 2015
